product_overview: Taalam is a comprehensive e-learning mobile application for Android and iOS platforms, providing courses, user management, interactive content, and administrative control to facilitate seamless online learning experiences for students and administrators.
core_goals: Provide a user-friendly and secure platform for student registration and login using phone number and OTP verification.
Enable comprehensive course management including hierarchical structure, multimedia content delivery, and code-based course access.
Support financial and sales management with detailed reporting and export capabilities.
Deliver advanced interactive content features such as video playback with DRM and interactive assignments including media upload.
Offer robust admin control over courses, students, sales, coupons, ads, notifications, and user suggestions.
Ensure seamless communication between users and support via WhatsApp/Telegram integration for purchases.
Implement validation and monitoring mechanisms for course video links and promotional content.
Provide notification and feedback systems to maintain user engagement and satisfaction.
key_features: User Onboarding with Introduction Cards and OTP-based Phone Number Authentication.
Hierarchical Course Management: Specialization, Subject, Instructor, Level, Lessons with multimedia content and purchase options.
Course Code Purchase and Activation via external communication apps (WhatsApp/Telegram).
Coupon Management for discount applications on eligible courses.
Video Playback with DRM protection to prevent unauthorized screen recording and end-of-unit quizzes.
User Profile Management including personal information editing, password change, and suggestion submission.

Admin Dashboard with modules for Course Management, Student Management with geographic filtering, Sales & Financial Management with Excel export, Ads Management (Stories), Coupon and Sub-Admin Management.
Interactive Advanced Tests allowing media file uploads as part of answers.
YouTube Video Link Verification system to check validity and notify admin of broken links.
Notification Center to display alerts related to new courses, updates, and expiring codes.
Suggestion Management enabling admins to review, mark as read, or delete student feedback.
user_flow_summary: User launches app and is greeted with introductory cards that can be swiped or skipped.
User proceeds to registration by entering phone number, receiving OTP, setting password, and providing personal details including avatar.
User logs in using phone number and password; multi-device login is restricted.
Student accesses course catalog and views detailed course pages including demo videos, instructors, pricing, and course content.
User purchases course access code by redirecting to WhatsApp/Telegram for payment.
User activates course code within the app and gains access to course materials and video lessons.
User watches DRM-protected videos with control features and takes end-of-unit quizzes.
User submits suggestions or feedback which admins can review and respond to.
Admin logs into web-based dashboard to manage courses, students, sales, finances, coupons, ads, and notifications.
Admin generates purchase codes, manages user accounts distinguishing users inside/outside Syria, applies coupons, and analyzes sales/financial reports.
Admin monitors YouTube link health and updates broken URLs.
Admins handle user suggestions and manage sub-admin accounts with equivalent privileges.
validation_criteria: OTP verification workflow must ensure correct phone number and successful code input before account creation.
Login validation must include phone number and password correctness, with clear error messages and multi-device login blocked.
Course code purchase link must correctly open external messengers with pre-filled messages.
Video playback must prevent screen capture and allow only up to 30 seconds media upload for tests.
Coupon codes apply discounts only when eligibility criteria (minimum purchased courses) are met and prices reflect discount.
Admin interfaces must verify YouTube links and immediately flag or disable broken links with notifications.
All data inputs (registration, codes, coupon creation) must include strict validation rules and visual user feedback.
Admin exports of financial reports must be accurate and conform to Excel format standards.
User suggestion statuses must update dynamically and allow deletion or marking as read.
All user and admin UI screens must pass usability guidelines ensuring clarity, ease of navigation, and responsiveness.
